name: "Rosina" Barbera D'Asti by Garetto
serverNotes:

name: San Felice Chianti Classico
serverNotes:
üìñ ABOUT: (agricolasanfelice.it) Classic Tuscan Chianti Classico from San Felice. DOCG quality - quintessential Tuscan table wine!

üç∑ STYLE: Medium-bodied Sangiovese | Red cherry, dried herbs & hints of leather | Balanced acidity, soft tannins | Traditional Tuscany.

name: G.D. Vajra Barolo Albe
serverNotes:
üåø ABOUT: Premium Barolo from renowned biodynamic producer G.D. Vajra (Wine Spectator 93 pts!). Quality-focused family winery.

üç∑ STYLE: Full-bodied Nebbiolo | Classic Barolo with rose, tar & red fruit | Elegant, balanced | Traditional Piedmont style | Complex, age-worthy.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Braised beef, truffle dishes, aged cheese, risotto.

üí° BY THE GLASS: Serious wine for connoisseurs. Rare opportunity to try premium Barolo by the glass!

name: Bussola Valpolicella Ripasso
serverNotes:
üçá ABOUT: (bussola.eu) Valpolicella Ripasso from Bussola in Veneto. DOCG quality - made with special 'ripasso' method!

üç∑ STYLE: Medium to full-bodied | Rich cherry, raisin & spice | Re-fermented on Amarone grape skins | Smooth, velvety texture | Step up from regular Valpolicella.

üçΩÔ∏è PAIRS WITH: Osso buco, roasted meats, risotto, braised dishes.

üí° BY THE GLASS: The ripasso method adds richness and complexity. Think of it as 'baby Amarone'!

name: Caparzo Brunello di Montalcino
serverNotes:
